mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (client_email, client_name, jira_id, phone_number, project_description, project_name, admin_id) VALUES (#{clientEmail}, #{clientName},#{jiraId}, #{phoneNumber}, #{projectDescription}, #{projectName}, #{adminId})
mapper.update: UPDATE project SET status = #{status}, client_email = #{clientEmail}, client_name = #{clientName}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, jira_id = #{jiraId}, project_description = #{projectDescription}, project_name = #{projectName} WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND admin_id = #{adminId}
